name: @luisfun/cloudflare-ai-plugin
description: This plugin enables you to code REST API or AI Gateway in the same way as the binding AI when using Cloudflare's Workers AI
author: Luis (https://github.com/LuisFun)

scripts.patch: npm run fix && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor: npm run fix && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major: npm run fix && npm version major && git push --follow-tags
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && npm run esbuild:cjs && npm run esbuild:esm
